criteria.name: Programming/Software Development
expectations: Writes clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Applies appropriate design patterns and best practices
Debugs and troubleshoots technical issues effectively
Stays current with relevant technologies and frameworks
Contributes to code reviews and maintains quality standards

criteria.name: Solution Architecture
expectations: Designs scalable and maintainable system architectures
Makes informed technology choices based on requirements
Documents architectural decisions and rationale
Considers security, performance, and reliability in designs
Collaborates with stakeholders on technical solutions

criteria.name: Systems Design
expectations: Designs systems that scale effectively with growth
Considers integration points and dependencies
Plans for monitoring, logging, and observability
Addresses performance bottlenecks proactively
Ensures system reliability and fault tolerance

criteria.name: Project Management
expectations: Plans and organizes work effectively
Manages timelines and delivers on commitments
Communicates progress and risks clearly
Coordinates with team members and stakeholders
Adapts plans based on changing requirements

criteria.name: Requirements Definition
expectations: Gathers and analyzes business requirements
Translates requirements into technical specifications
Asks clarifying questions and validates understanding
Documents requirements clearly and completely
Manages scope changes and requirement evolution

criteria.name: Testing
expectations: Writes comprehensive unit and integration tests
Develops effective testing strategies
Automates testing processes where appropriate
Identifies edge cases and boundary conditions
Ensures quality through systematic testing approaches

criteria.name: Problem Management
expectations: Identifies root causes of issues systematically
Develops effective solutions to complex problems
Escalates issues appropriately when needed
Documents solutions for future reference
Prevents recurring issues through process improvements

criteria.name: Innovation
expectations: Proposes creative solutions to business challenges
Experiments with new technologies and approaches
Shares knowledge and insights with the team
Drives process improvements and efficiencies
Stays current with industry trends and best practices

criteria.name: Release/Deployment
expectations: Manages deployment processes effectively
Ensures smooth production releases
Implements CI/CD pipelines and automation
Monitors system health post-deployment
Handles rollbacks and emergency responses

criteria.name: Accountability
expectations: Takes responsibility for own actions and decisions
Meets commitments consistently
Admits mistakes and learns from them
Follows through on responsibilities
Takes ownership of project outcomes

criteria.name: Influence
expectations: Mentors junior team members effectively
Influences technical decisions positively
Builds consensus around important initiatives
Communicates ideas clearly to stakeholders
Leads by example in professional conduct

criteria.name: Agility
expectations: Adapts quickly to changing requirements
Embraces change positively
Maintains effectiveness during uncertainty
Adjusts strategies based on new information
Helps others navigate change

criteria.name: Inclusion
expectations: Values diverse perspectives and experiences
Creates an inclusive environment for all team members
Ensures equitable participation in discussions
Promotes diverse viewpoints in decision-making
Supports inclusive practices in team activities
